alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 26 at 2:15PM PDT until September 27 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Isolated gusts to 60 mph. Strongest below and through passes and canyons. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These strong winds will combine with a dry air mass to create elevated to potentially critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
